title: Kale Akte
description: Kale Akte was the site of a Sikel center that received an Ionian colony. The precise location of the ancient settlement is unknown, although it is placed in the area of Marina di Caronia.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 18065
